comments.body: Shouldn't these be returning `any`, instead of `void` if they're untyped? (Since I assume many _do_ return values)

spot checking and most of them do not return anything:

https://github.com/paypal/PayPal-node-SDK/blob/master/lib/resources/Payment.js#L26

I have never used one with a return and they all have callbacks, so I went with void.  Let me know if you want them changed
